sentences.en: A smile creeps onto his face as he realizes that he’s in the infirmary.
sentences.cn: 一丝笑容爬上他的脸上，他意识到自己身处于医务室中。

sentences.en: All they need now are the keys to the infirmary.
sentences.cn: 现在所需要的就是医务室的门钥匙。

sentences.en: Ameris smiled and followed her mistress into the infirmary.
sentences.cn: 阿茉瑞斯微笑着,跟随她的女主人走进了医务室.

sentences.en: Dallas:Something has attached itself to him. We have to get him to the infirmary right away.
sentences.cn: 达拉斯：有东西寄生在他体内。我们必须马上把他送进医务室。

sentences.en: Figure out how you're going to get the key to the infirmary yet?
sentences.cn: 想出来怎么拿到医务室的钥匙了 吗 ?

sentences.en: High tourism, education amendments, infirmary entertainment, leisure and other professional tourism value.
sentences.cn: 具有很高的旅游观光 、 修学教育 、 疗养娱乐 、 休闲度假和其他专业旅游价值.

sentences.en: Is Brad Bellick still here in infirmary?
sentences.cn: 布拉德贝里克还在医务室 吗 ?

sentences.en: Madeleine had Fantine removed to that infirmary which he had established in his own house.
sentences.cn: 马德兰先生雇了人把芳汀抬到他自己厂房里的疗养室.

sentences.en: My little brother was taken to the infirmary.
sentences.cn: 我的小弟弟被送进医院.

sentences.en: My little sister was taken to the infirmary.
sentences.cn: 我的小妹妹被送进医院。

sentences.en: My mother came down with typhoid fever and spent the entire trip's infirmary.
sentences.cn: 我的母亲染上了伤寒,整旅程中都躺在船上的医疗室.

sentences.en: Now I'd like you to report to the infirmary, including your guest.
sentences.cn: 现在我想让你们去医务室报到, 包括你们的客人.

sentences.en: Please follow that person, she will take you to the vaccination infirmary.
sentences.cn: 请跟那个人去, 她会带您到那边医务室打针.

sentences.en: Robinovitz pushed past the queue jamming the passageway outside the infirmary.
sentences.cn: 罗宾诺维茨挤过在医务室门外阻塞了通道的长队.

sentences.en: She still remained in the infirmary.
sentences.cn: 她始终留在那间养病室里.

sentences.en: The infirmary is the weakest link in the security chain.
sentences.cn: 医务室是整个保安体系中最薄弱的环节.

sentences.en: The infirmary man may count me dead. When I've gone to find my ain true love.
sentences.cn: 医生或许认为我已死去, 此时我就要去找寻我的真情挚爱.

trans.tran_en: a hospital – often used in the names of hospitals in Britain
